RunHandled.description: While function passed as first argument blocks execution, executes the handler functions in the parameters that follow (pair of On, OnEvery event and a function).

RunAsync.description: Starts the execution of the provided function in another thread and immediatelly resumes execution of current thread.

Event.description: Designates an event on an object

Delay.description: Delay in seconds to wait upon.

Wait.description: Blocks execution until the waited condition is fulfilled.

Wait(Delay()).description: Blocks execution until provided number of seconds have passed.

Wait(Event()).description: Blocks execution until provided event was signaled.
